alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 09 at 3:12PM AKDT until October 09 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles and aircraft. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High winds associated with a strong front moving north over Southeast Alaska will persist into the early evening hours. Winds are expected to diminish rapidly after the front passes by.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
